Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface ClientRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client, ServerSocketSpeaker
    public interface ClientRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This class contains all the remote methods of the client that can be invoked from the server. These methods are parameterized to keep a lightened network implementation. Any other method should be implemented using the ones of this class (I.E. The request of an answer like "How are you?" should be implemented using genericWithResponse method passing a keyword as first parameter and the question as second parameter. This keyword should then be correctly interpreted from the client and managed accordingly)

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean booleanQuestion​(java.lang.String parameters)
      This method should implement a boolean interaction with the user, that allows him to answer with a boolean value to a simple question
      void genericWithoutResponse​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String parameters)
      This method should be used to implement the parsing of the parameters based on the id.
      java.lang.String genericWithResponse​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String parameters)
      This method should be used to implement the parsing of the parameters based on the id.
      int[] multipleChoice​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String parameters)
      This method should implement the interaction with the user that allows him to choose multiple values in a given set
      int ping()
      This method should just return any value.
      int singleChoice​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String parameters)
      This method should implement the interaction with the user that allows him to choose a single value in a given set

    • Method Detail

      • ping

        int ping()
  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method should just return any value. It is used to check the connection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • genericWithoutResponse

        void genericWithoutResponse​(java.lang.String id,
                            java.lang.String parameters)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method should be used to implement the parsing of the parameters based on the id. To every id should be associated a different behavior of the method
        Parameters:
        id - should denote the way parameters should be interpreted
        parameters - should be parsed based on the id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • genericWithResponse

        java.lang.String genericWithResponse​(java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String parameters)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method should be used to implement the parsing of the parameters based on the id. To every id should be associated a different behavior of the method
        Parameters:
        id - should denote the way parameters should be interpreted
        parameters - should be parsed based on the id
        Returns:
        a value coherent with the id and the parameters
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • singleChoice

        int singleChoice​(java.lang.String id,
                 java.lang.String parameters)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method should implement the interaction with the user that allows him to choose a single value in a given set
        Parameters:
        id - should denote the type of the parameters
        parameters - should be parsed based in the id
        Returns:
        a value chosen by the user
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • multipleChoice

        int[] multipleChoice​(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String parameters)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method should implement the interaction with the user that allows him to choose multiple values in a given set
        Parameters:
        id - should denote the type of the parameters
        parameters - should be parsed based in the id
        Returns:
        set of values chosen by the user
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • booleanQuestion

        boolean booleanQuestion​(java.lang.String parameters)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method should implement a boolean interaction with the user, that allows him to answer with a boolean value to a simple question
        Parameters:
        parameters - should be the question to be submitted to the user
        Returns:
        the boolean answer to the question chosen by the user
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
